column4: yes, XP (I'm slowly converting all my XP machine to Ubuntu). I am unable to connect to my modem/router via places>network but i can login via the web browser and browse the net (I am using the connection now)
can you login to the router through the browser? thats how i usually handle mine
I have a usb drive in the modem which i can usually access for my shared files, I use it like a filer server.
